localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Vidbix enables your customers to explain their issues by recording their screen+voice without the need to install anything on their side. Itâ€™s faster to explain for your customers and gives all the context to your agents to solve issues faster and personally.
nodes.title: Vidbix - Reverse Loom for support
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: Does your SaaS product have multiple users per account, or multiple accounts per user? Unlike other email automation tools, Userlist now supports companies, and allows you to onboard and engage teams in a smart way.
nodes.title: Company Accounts by Userlist - Email the right user at the right time
nodes.author: Charlie Irish

nodes.excerpt: Tidio is an intuitive, no-coding chatbot tool that improves your live chat with automation that you can control.
nodes.title: Tidio - Live chat bot to boost customer engagement & sales
nodes.author: Przemek Szustak

nodes.excerpt: You asked for it, we built it! Neo is back with SMS keywords to help you customize marketing, sales & customer support and become the most authentic brand on the market! Join us if you're exhausted from spammy marketing and just want to spread good vibes :)
nodes.title: Neo SMS Keywords - Customize SMS marketing and boost your sales in minutes
nodes.author: Lio Slama

nodes.excerpt: Here's a well curated list of 168 tech and industry providers for Shopify merchants, from all major categories, including SMS Marketing, Customer Service, Analytics, Financial tools, and much, much more. Steal the JPG here or click link for HQ PDF version.
nodes.title: Shopify Technology Landscape - Curated List of over 150 Tools to Grow Your Store
nodes.author: Derric Haynie

nodes.excerpt: Papercups EU is an open source live customer chat tool that is hosted in the EU for GDPR compliance purposes. We provide React/React Native/Flutter/HTML chat components for a ton of flexibility and customizability.
nodes.title: Papercups EU - Open source live chat tool hosted in EU
nodes.author: Kam Leung

nodes.excerpt: Zoom Escaper is a tool to help you escape Zoom meetings and other videoconferencing scenarios. It allows you to self-sabotage your audio stream, making your presence unbearable to others. Made by: https://twitter.com/sam_lavigne
nodes.title: Zoom Escaper - Self-sabotage your audio stream and escape Zoom meetings
nodes.author: Sankalp Sinha

nodes.excerpt: Lack of communication channels on websites results in customer churn, low satisfaction rate and minimal to zero customer success. LiveCaller solves those issues by offering all in one solution, that combines Web Call, Web Chat, Callback, Social Messaging Apps
nodes.title: LiveCaller - Free web call with online chat, omni channel and co-browsing
nodes.author: Tanjum ğŸ”¥

nodes.excerpt: Vtiger Cloud CRM now has a Forever Free edition for all those who sign up in 2021. Pilot Edition is a part of the Vtiger Re: boot program, and this is built to help companies to accelerate their growth and recovery coming out of the pandemic.
nodes.title: Vtiger Pilot - Free CRM software built for companies getting started
nodes.author: Shilpa

nodes.excerpt: Text Blaze allows you to save text snippets and insert them anywhere on the web using keyboard shortcuts. Snippets can be plain text, but can also include dynamic dates, formulas, real-time input and integrations with other apps. Try it, it's free!
nodes.title: Text Blaze - Save time by eliminating repetitive typing
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Send every customer a personalized onboarding checklist, with automated email reminders, assigned tasks, and a lot more. Upgrade that dusty spreadsheet and onboarding process you no longer love. Onboard your next customer with Arrows.
nodes.title: Arrows - Collaborative onboarding for high-touch customers
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Surveys are broken, so we used video + audio to reimagine them. ğŸ’¬ Reach out via SMS ğŸ“±Customers record video right in their web browser ğŸ“Š Transcriptions, sentiment, and emotion to make sense of videos at scale ğŸš€Capture authentic customer videos and reviews
nodes.title: Intercept - Reimagine customer feedback using video and audio surveys
nodes.author: Drew Watkins

nodes.excerpt: A single place to store your customer feedback, manage it and act upon it! Try out our new feedback widget to catch customer feedback right inside your app!
nodes.title: ProdCamp Feedback Widget - Nail your customer feedback
nodes.author: Anton Zorin

nodes.excerpt: Vidjet is a smart video player for websites. It uses a popup format to display videos, so you can segment and trigger them to your visitors. â € It's also the easiest and fastest way to publish videos on a website! ğŸš€
nodes.title: Vidjet - Popup-video player for websites
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Upgrade Zoom with a bluetooth connected keypad that lets you run Zoom with the click of a button. Video calls are easier with your twenty-two favorite Zoom shortcuts on one amazing hotkey pad. Available for both Windows and Mac.
nodes.title: Zapp Pad - Say goodbye to Zoom fails and communicate with confidence
nodes.author: Joe Martin

nodes.excerpt: Minerva is the easiest way to capture and share clickable instructions for anything on the internet. No screenshots. No red arrows. No videos. Just step-by-step guidance. The Minerva Chrome extension lets you embed complex documentation into a URL!
nodes.title: Minerva Pro - A better way to capture and share process online
nodes.author: Trace Cohen

nodes.excerpt: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel communication platform built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
nodes.title: Chatwoot - Open-source customer communication platform
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Our AI-powered video platform transforms text into a pixel-perfect, ready-to-post video. No more need for film crews, studios, or post-production. Customers are using us for: e-learning, sales, e-commerce, and more.
nodes.title: AI-powered video creator - No more need for film crews, studios, or post-production
nodes.author: Carlos

nodes.excerpt: Papercups is an open-source live customer chat app written in Elixir. We are a dev friendly alternative to Intercom and Drift that is highly extensible and customizable. We also have a Slack integration that lets you reply from Slack.
nodes.title: Papercups 2.0 - Open source Intercom and Drift alternative
nodes.author: Kam Leung

nodes.excerpt: Hugo improves meeting productivity for teams. It connects to your work calendar providing one place to collaboratively prepare, take notes, assign tasks and share insights. â € Get on top of remote meetings with notes that connect to your team and their tools.
nodes.title: Hugo - Better meetings through centralized, actionable notes
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Most users don't trust written reviews anymore. We built a platform for businesses to collect audio reviews from customers - adding an unmistakable touch of authenticity.
nodes.title: Howlr - Record audio reviews from customers.
nodes.author: Nitish Rathee

nodes.excerpt: Our 1-click video call platform enables the end customer to call the business with zero friction. Visual engagement creates trust, facilitates the transaction, accelerates sales, improves satisfaction. Make real-time video an integral part of your solutions.
nodes.title: 11Sight - 1-click video calls for customers on your product or website
nodes.author: Dr. Aleks Gollu

nodes.excerpt: We have built a tool for developers and businesses in Africa to engage thier customers via different messaging channels like SMS,Voice,Email,Whatsapp We currently have built APIs for devs to integrate and working on no-code tools for business owners.
nodes.title: Sendchamp - Multi-channel messaging tool for devs & businesses in Africa
nodes.author: GOODNESS  KAYODE

nodes.excerpt: RapidReg - a scheduling and form building tool that includes all you need in one place, at a price you can't beat! Registrations, Form & survey builders, Availability calendars & online booking, Pricing and payments, and go green with planted trees!
nodes.title: RapidReg LTD - Forms, bookings & scheduler with no limits that plants trees
